reference.title: DTD directory information
reference.shortdesc: The files in the DTD directory define the music specializations. The DTD files include several of the OASIS DITA 1.0 domains along with the music specialization itself. OASIS modules are pulled in from the toolkit's DTD directory; new files for this specialization are all located in this directory.

refbody.section:
The directory actually contains two distinct specializations:
The song collection specialization is much newer. It declares a new songCollection topic type, which primarily consists of a specialized table intended to define one song per row. Most of the samples in this plug-in use the song collection specialization.
The older music collection specialization uses a specialized table to define information about individual CDs. This specialization is older and has not been updated recently.
